heading: HR00887
0: RESOLUTION EARNESTLY RECOMMENDING TO THE DEPARTMENT OF BUDGET AND MANAGEMENT (DBM) TO CONSIDER THE RESOLUTIONS OF THE HOUSE SPECIAL COMMITTEE ON NORTH LUZON GROWTH QUADRANGLE, REFERRING TO THE DEPARTMENT OF AGRICULTURE (DA) AND THE NATIONAL IRRIGATION ADMINISTRATION (NIA) CONCERNING BUDGETARY ALLOCATIONS IN THE INTEREST OF FULFILLING THEIR RESPECTIVE MANDATE IN TERMS OF MAINTENANCE AND OTHER OPERATING EXPENSES (MOOE), CAPITAL OUTLAY AND PROGRAM FUNDS NATIONWIDE AND PARTICULARLY IN REGIONS I, II AND CAR, ANNEXED HERETO AS A AND B, RESPECTIVELY
